page.title: 10LOWTHER AND DAWSON.
page.content: This company builds chiefly in the Kendal area but also does work further afield if need be. It was started by {Ken Lowther}in 1955. { Energy conservation}is important and it costs Â£1100 to insulate a house. {House designs}have become more varied over the years while the materials used have altered because of changing safety regulations. The size of a house depends on what people want and can afford; the company tries to give people the design they ask for, but this depends on{planning permission. { Lowther and Dawson}are responsible for 550 houses in this area.{Kendal {Creameries}which took a year to build was their largest project. At{Kendal {Parks}they have built 400 homes to be followed by a further 78. They have also completed a shop and will soon be building several play areas.
